name: f1dm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wfn(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl((c0 : c1 ↣ c2), dom(c0)= c1, c0[Fn]c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))

|- wi(wf1(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
